name: my farm (itch)
description:
This retro animal-collection firming sim  was developed as a gift and a demonstration tool  In a self imposed "game jam " there will be YouTube videos featuring the build.

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
